Articles.Content:
The Drifter is an aircraft made for fun!

It's highly maneuverable and highly stable, it can pull 20G+ turns and even fly at down to a bit below 20 m/s while remaining airborne and controllable.

Not sure what else to say, i made a video (that is way too long but ow well,) to show a few of its capabilities both at high and low speeds, i wasn't able to go all out though because even though the video is running smoothly enough, the game was running at about 20 fps (full HD Fraps'ing on a Core 2 Duo processor ) which is not a lot to work with when having to react quickly.

Have fun!
